meaning_str.bing:
n. 家庭；一家人；同住一所（或一套）房子的人
adj. 家庭的；家常的；王室的
网络. 户；住户；家用的

家庭；一家人；同住一所（或一套）房子的人

家庭成员；同住一所房子的人；户；家庭；家族
家庭的；家内的；一家的；家喻户晓的；日常的；家常的；普通的

1.en: They must be able to go back and forth and fit into each household without disruption of educational and social activities.
1.cn: 他们必须学会在不影响学习和社会活动的前提下融入父母新的家庭，保持和父母双方的交流沟通。

2.en: In this case, 20 percent is often a good proxy for critical mass in a household.
2.cn: 通常，20%的家庭拥有量是技术达到临界量的一个合理标志。

3.en: He said as long as the old lady of the household let him in her home one night, he could, "" beast, drove them off.
3.cn: 他对一户老婆婆说只要使他在她家里住一晚，他定能将“年”兽赶走。

0.en: Did you know you could calculate the mass of an electron using household items? It's true.
0.cn: 你知道可以用手边的家庭用品计算出电子的质量吗？这是真的哦。

1.en: They were always attentive and respectful, when I tell them about what it was like for me, growing up in a Chinese household with strict parents who made me study.
1.cn: 他们总是很照顾人，尊重人，当我给他们讲我的故事，在中国人的家庭中长大，有非常严格的父母总是让我学习。

2.en: Why can't we just play with her friends. Because Topanga, The second she allowed Dr. Turtleneck and Mr. Howdy into our household, our family was compromised by interlopers.
2.cn: 我们何不跟她的朋友们一起玩呢。因为呀，塔佩佳，一旦她允许龟颈博士和豪迪先生闯入我们家，我们的家庭就会被外人攻占。

3.en: Please stay. We need at least one adult in this household.
3.cn: 求你别走，我们家至少需要一个大人。

4.en: Today, 15 years passed, we've grown so significantly and have become a household name in China.
4.cn: 如今，十五年过去了，我们在中国已经成了一个家喻户晓的名字。

5.en: There was a time when British Olympic medal winners became household names because there were so few of them.
5.cn: 曾经，英国奥林匹克奖牌获得者们因为人数稀少而家喻户晓。

6.en: I mean, it's the most watched TV show on the planet and every household in China and beyond will be watching it.
6.cn: 这可是世界上收看人数最多的电视节目，中国的家家户户还有些别处的人们都在看。

7.en: We got a whole bunch of boats. 12 Jennys, big old warehouse. We even have hats that say Bubba Gump on them. Bubba Gump Shrimp. It's a household name.
7.cn: 我们购置了一大堆船，有12条珍妮号，还有一个大仓库，我们还订做了帽子上面写着“布巴·甘” 。布巴·甘捕虾公司，这名字家喻户晓。

8.en: When you are married, you will make me the head of the royal household. Anastasia and Drisella we will pair off with wealthy lords. And I shall manage that boy.
8.cn: 当你结婚以后，你要奉我为皇室之首，安娜斯塔西亚和多莉希拉也要和贵族们成婚，并由我来掌管那男孩。
